title: Key partners
desc: Who are your most important partners? Which key ressources do you acquire from partners? Which key activities do your partners perform?

title: Key activities
desc: What are the activities you perform every day to create & deliver your value proposition

title: Key ressources
desc: What are the resources you need to create & deliver your value proposition?

title: Value propositions
desc: What is the value you delivery to your customer? Which of your customer's problems are you helping to solve? What is the customer need that your value proposition addresses? What is your promise to your customers? What are the products and services you create for your customers?

title: Customer relationships
desc: What relationship does each customer segment expect you to establish and maintain?

title: Channels
desc: How does your value proposition reach your customer? Where can your customer buy or use your products or services?

title: Customer segments
desc: For whom are you creating value? What are the customer segments that either pay, receive or decide on your value proposition?

title: Cost structure
desc: What are the important costs you make to create & delivery your value propostion?

title: Revenue streams
desc: How do customers reward you for the value you provide to them? What are the different revenue models?
